targets.expr: sum by (server_name) (online_players{project_name="${project_name}", zone_id="$zone_id", server_type="avatar"}) OR sum by (server_name) (avatar_online_players{project_name="${project_name}", zone_id="$zone_id"})

panels.title: Avatar 单服务器在线人数

targets.expr: sum by (server_name) (online_players{project_name="${project_name}", zone_id="$zone_id", server_type="world"}) OR sum by (server_name) (world_online_players{project_name="${project_name}", zone_id="$zone_id"})

panels.title: World 单服务器在线人数

targets.expr: clamp_min(sum(rate(http_server_requests_code_total{project_name="$project_name", zone_id="$zone_id", server_type="account", path="/Account/Login", code!="200"}[$__rate_interval])), 0) / clamp_min(sum(rate(http_server_requests_code_total{project_name="$project_name", zone_id="$zone_id", server_type="account", path="/Account/Login"}[$__rate_interval])), 1) * 100 or vector(0)

clamp_min(sum by(path_name) (rate(http_server_requests_duration_ms_sum{project_name="$project_name", zone_id="$zone_id", server_type="account", path="/Account/Login"}[$__rate_interval])), 0) / clamp_min(sum by(path_name) (rate(http_server_requests_duration_ms_count{project_name="$project_name", zone_id="$zone_id", server_type="account", path="/Account/Login"}[$__rate_interval])), 1)

panels.title: 登录 API 响应延迟（ms）

targets.expr: clamp_min(sum by(server_name, type) (rate(frame_fps_sum{project_name="$project_name", zone_id="$zone_id", type="tick"}[$__rate_interval])), 0) / clamp_min(sum by(server_name, type) (rate(frame_fps_count{project_name="$project_name", zone_id="$zone_id",  type="tick"}[$__rate_interval])), 1)

clamp_min(sum by(api_name) (rate(message_response_delay_ms_sum{project_name="$project_name", zone_id="$zone_id"}[$__rate_interval])), 0) / clamp_min(sum by(api_name) (rate(message_response_delay_ms_count{project_name="$project_name", zone_id="$zone_id"}[$__rate_interval])), 1)
